resource: 1001813.vtc=true 1001813.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001813.derived=false 1001813.description=Prius Plug-in EV Mode is a blended operation of electricity and gas and can work under certain conditions up to 11 miles on a full charge. Quick acceleration and braking, road and vehicle conditions, or climate control use may prevent or limit usage or effectiveness of EV Mode.
